ygData.subject: Re: Mana calculation for int...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The most agreed upon formula for mana is this (Int/5+1)*Level = Mana.   Your numbers come pretty close to this.
ygData.messageBody:
Paul McClung wrote:

> From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>
>
> I don't know if the different spell casters use different formulas for mana
> gain, but on an enchanters web page I found table that I could enter
> different int values and find out how much mana I should have at a
> particular level.
>
> So just for grins I did all my calculations at level 50, and made an
> interesting discovery.
>
> For 130 int I would have 1400 mana.
> For 110 int I would have 1200 mana.
>
>

The most agreed upon formula for mana is this (Int/5+1)*Level = Mana. Your
numbers come pretty close to this.
